title: HUGE SAVINGS AT HIDDEN COVE!!$500 OFF 1ST MONTH
posting_body: ['Your Home.', 'Your Life.', 'Our Commitment.', 'CALL:', 'show contact info', 'x776', '.', '2 Bed 2 Bath .', '1035 Sq.', 'Ft', 'Hidden Cove', 'Address:', '3335 Hauck Street Las Vegas, NV 89146', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Offering resort-style rental living within the heart of Las Vegas.', 'We are located just minutes from the Las Vegas strip, major expressways and fantastic shopping and dining.', 'With our attentive staff, resident events and a full list of amenities, Hidden Cove offers all the comforts of a tranquil home within a metropolitan city.', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT\u2002 \u2002FEATURES', 'Relaxing Roman Tub', 'Private Patio or Balcony', 'Wood Vinyl Flooring', 'Full-Size Washer and Dryer', 'Fully-Appointed Kitchen', 'Spacious Walk-In Closet', 'Espresso Cabinet Upgrade', 'OFFICE\u2002 \u2002HOURS', 'Monday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Tuesday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Wednesday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Thursday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Friday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday', '8:00am to 5:00pm', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x776', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
